metadata.title: CVE-2019-12094 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Horde Groupware Webmail Edition through 5.2.22 allows XSS via anadmin/user.php?form=update_f&user_name= oradmin/user.php?form=remove_f&user_name= or admin/config/diff.php?app= URI.

criterions.comment: php-horde-trean: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
php-horde-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
